## Load Libraries, Settings and Global Functions

```{r warning=FALSE,error=FALSE,message=FALSE}
# For general data science
library(tidyverse)

library(janitor)

# For loading Excel files
library(readxl)

library(lubridate)

# For U.S. Census Bureau data
library(tigris)

# For pretty tables
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)

## Functions 

# Function for formatted table output

output_formatted_table = function(table, text){
  
  table %>% 
    kable(caption = text) %>%
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), font_size = 14, fixed_thead = T) %>%
    scroll_box(width = "100%")
}

files_to_df = function(path, type){
  # path is the string file path
  # type is in the format of "*csv"
  
  merged_data <- do.call(bind_rows, lapply(list.files(pattern = type, path = path), function(i){
  path = paste0(path, i)
  read_csv(path)}))
  
  return(merged_data)
}

X2016_01_Crime_Log_pdf <- read_csv("~/Code/university_police_logs/data/handmade/gt/csvs/2016-01 Crime Log.pdf.csv", 
    skip = 3)

```
## Load and Clean Data

```{r}


gt_incident_log = files_to_df("../data/handmade/gt/csvs/", "*csv")

gt_incident_log = gt_incident_log %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate_all(~gsub('[^ -~]', '', .)) %>% 
  mutate_all(tolower) %>% 
  filter(!(str_detect(x1, "report date"))) %>% 
  filter(!(str_detect(x1, "crime log"))) 
  
tolower(gt_incident_log$...2)
         
gt_incident_log  = gt_incident_log %>% 
  # clean names
  clean_names() %>% 
  # make date columns a date type
  remove_empty(c("rows", "cols"))
  

```

## Export

```{r}

write_rds(gwu_incident_log, "../data/processed/gwu_incident_log.rds")
write_csv(gwu_incident_log, "../data/processed/gwu_incident_log.csv")




```
